name: Freyaelin Elensar
background: Former Border Protector, Now a Wanderer
attacks:
- Elven Longbow +6 1d8+4 piercing
- Twin Shortswords +6 1d6+4 slashing
- Dagger +6 1d4+4 piercing
equipment:
- Leather Armor
- Longbow & 20 arrows
- Twin Shortswords
- Hooded Cloak
- Explorer’s Pack (Rope, bedroll
- rations
- tinderbox
- waterskin)
- Potion of Healing (x2)
personality_traits: Rarely speaks unless necessary; watches everything like a predator.
ideals: The strong should protect the weak. Slavery and tyranny are unforgivable.
bonds: A silver pendant from her lost family—her only memento.
flaws: Trusts few, opens up to even fewer. Struggles with guilt over past failures.
features_traits:
- Darkvision (60 ft.)
- Fey Ancestry
- Trance
- Cantrip: Prestidigitation
- Favored Enemy: Humanoids (Bandits & Slavers)
- Natural Explorer: Forest
- Fighting Style: Archery (+2 to ranged attack rolls)
- Spellcasting: Hunter’s Mark
- Pass Without Trace
- Cure Wounds
- Dread Ambusher
- Umbral Sight
proficiencies_languages:
- Languages: Elvish, Common, Sylvan; 
- Tool Proficiencies: Herbalism Kit
